name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RALify - NCS to RAL Colour Converter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert NCS color codes to RAL and vice versa.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RALify is your go-to tool for converting colors between two of the world’s most recognized color systems: NCS (Natural Color System) and RAL (Reichs-Ausschuss für Lieferbedingungen). Whether you’re an interior designer, architect, or paint professional, RALify simplifies the task of finding equivalent colors between NCS and RAL.

Key Features:
Two-way Conversion: Convert NCS to RAL or RAL to NCS with just a few clicks.
Instant Results: Enter a code and get accurate matches, complete with color previews and related color information.
Clean, User-Friendly Interface: Designed for ease of use with a simple, intuitive layout.
Cross-Platform Access: Access your color conversion tool directly from your Chrome browser.
High Precision: Results include Delta E values for more accurate color matching.

No more flipping between color charts! With RALify, you can quickly and easily find corresponding colors between the two systems, making your color matching tasks faster and more efficient.

Who Is It For?
Interior Designers: Easily find RAL equivalents for your NCS color choices.
Architects & Builders: Speed up the process of selecting compatible color palettes across different systems.
Paint Professionals: Ensure precise color matching for projects that require both NCS and RAL codes.

Simplify your color conversions today with RALify!
